MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH42 area of Dunbar, affecting properties in Little Pinkerton Cottages and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6pm due to repairs required to our overhead electricity network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:15pm on Tuesday, 16 March 2021
